name: Siberia: The Frozen Front
description:
Siberia: The Frozen Front is all about survival and cooperation in hostile 17th century Siberia. - Gather resources and use them to prepare your villagers for winter - Make the right choices during "Event Scenarios" and be rewarded - Learn your villager's attributes and become a real leader Can you lead your villagers to survive the harsh winters of Siberia?

Created by Viacheslav Burmistrov & programmed by yours truly alongside a team of students over 4 months.
